scripts.test-use-snapshot: coralX test skip_compile true use_snapshot true
scripts.compile: npm run prettier && npm run lint && coralX compile
scripts.pre-release: npm run prettier && npm run lint && npm run test-with-timeout
scripts.migrate-reset: rm -rf build/contracts && rm -rf build/job-logs && coralX compile && coralX scenario --run migrateAndConfigureForTests
scripts.migrate-reset-local: rm -rf build/contracts && rm -rf build/job-logs && coralX compile && coralX scenario --run deployLocal
scripts.migrate-reset-apothem: rm -rf build/contracts && rm -rf build/job-logs && coralX compile && coralX scenario --run deployApothem
scripts.migrate-reset-mainnet: rm -rf build/contracts && rm -rf build/job-logs && coralX compile && coralX scenario --run deployMainNet
